mapper.select: SELECT u.user_id, u.username, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM friendships f WHERE f.user_id = u.user_id AND f.status = 'ACCEPTED' OR f.friend_id = u.user_id AND f.status = 'ACCEPTED') AS friend_count, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM messages m WHERE m.receiver_id = u.user_id AND m.is_read = FALSE) AS unread_msg_count, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM plans p WHERE p.user_id = u.user_id AND p.status = 'ACTIVE') AS active_plan_count FROM users u WHERE u.user_id = #{userId}
